REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Requires each local government to live stream and post video recordings of all open meetings and public hearings
Summary: Requires each local government to live stream and post video recordings of all open meetings and public hearings; requires each local government to post such recordings for a period of not less than five years.
LawCode: Amd ยง104, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to requiring all local governments to live stream open meetings and public hearings and make the recordings of such meetings and hearings available on the webpage of the local government
